Name: Premiere Performances Hong Kong
Description: A charity founded in 2007 to enable Hong Kong audiences to enjoy world class performances.

Name: Empower Asia
Description: An organisation that helps equip the next generation of Asian leaders through training, mentoring and coaching programs.

Name: Speak for Humanity
Description: An organisation that aims to engage the community in dialogue and unite global citizens to stand up and speak for all humanity.

Name: The House of Folklore
Description: A design studio showcasing a wide range of luxurious home decor and fashion accessories.

Name: HK Down Syndrome Association
Description: A charity which aims at improving the quality of life of persons living with Down Syndrome or other disabilities, and also of their families.
